subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bears signed quarterback Rex Grossman on Saturday to a one-year contract and prevented him from entering the free-agent market. Grossman, a 2003 first-round draft pick, started Super Bowl XLI for the Bears. After being benched following the third game last season, he returned for five more games and showed enough improvement to keep the Bears interested.
